testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type "male".........................................passed And user enter "automation" and "tester"....................................passed And user enter date of birth "23" and "July" and "1993".....................passed And user enter email "test-khalid5@example.com".............................passed And user enter passWord "P@ssw0rd"..........................................passed And confirm password "P@ssw0rd".............................................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then user get success message..............................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: And user navigates to login page............................................passed When user login "test-khalid5@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: And user navigates to login page............................................passed When user login "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"..........................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: user click Customer Currency
testcase.system-out: Given user go to home page..................................................passed When user select Currency "Euro" from list..................................passed Then prices of items will be in "€".........................................passed

testcase.name: search using item name
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to home page...........................................passed When user click on search...................................................passed And user enter search value "book"..........................................passed And user click on search button.............................................passed Then url contains search url................................................passed And search shows relevant results "book"....................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to home page...........................................passed When user click on search...................................................passed And user enter search value "laptop"........................................passed And user click on search button.............................................passed Then url contains search url................................................passed And search shows relevant results "laptop"..................................passed

testcase.classname: F05 | user could hover to any category and select sub-category
testcase.name: user hover to Computers category then select Desktops subcategory
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to home page...........................................passed When user hover to Computers category.......................................passed And user selects Desktop subcategory........................................passed Then user should be navigate to subcategory page "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/desktops".passed

testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to home page...........................................passed When user click on "facebook" icon..........................................passed Then user redirected to the required page "https://web.facebook.com/nopCommerce".passed
